COUNSEL 
Indika Mallawarachchi for the Accused-appellant.
P.  Kumararathnam DSG for the State.
Accused  appellant  was  convicted  under  Section  364(2)(e)  of  the
Penal Code as amended by act No  22 of 1995. The second charge  was also

under the same  section,  3rd,  4th,  5 th  and  6th 
charges are also under  the

After  the  trial  he  was  convicted  for 
the  18t  and  2 nd  charges  and

acquitted on the other charges on  13.11.2007, he was 
imposed a  sentence
of 10 years rigorous imprisonment for  both counts to run consecutively.
